263353.<speed=0>\n『施設の人々の管理』の説明です。\n<br>\nマイタウン:
This is an explanation of the "Facility People Management" function, which allows you to change the role, appearance, etc. of the
people in My Town and register new facility people. When you change the role, the tone of voice is reset to the initial one set for each
facility. My Town Salon Ticket is required to change the appearance. Please note that you cannot change the races and gender of the
registered salon staff later.

263354.<speed=0>\nマイタウンにいる 施設の人々の\nやくわりや 見た目などを:
<speed=0>
You can change the roles, appearance, etc. of
people in My Town and register new people.
<break>

263355.<%sM_npcname>さんと お別れします。\nよろしいですか？\n<yes:
I have to say goodbye to <%sM_npcname>. May I?
<yesno2>
<close>

263356.お別れした場合 元に戻すことはできませんが\n本当に <%sM_npcname>:
If we part ways, we can't undo it, but are you
sure you want to part ways with <%sM_npcname>?
<yesno2>
<close>

263357.マイタウン施設美容院券を 持っていません。\n施設の人の見た目を 変更するには\:
I do not have a My Town Salon Ticket. You need a My Town Salon Ticket to change the appearance of the people in your
establishment.

263358.<%sM_npcname>さんを 登録してよろしいですか？\n<yesno>\n:
Are you sure you want to register
<%sM_npcname>?
<yesno>
<break>

263359.登録には 素材の消費が必要です。\n素材を消費して 登録を完了します。\nよろし:
To register, you need to consume materials. I
will complete the registration by consuming
the material. Are you sure?

263360.登録に 必要な素材が 足りません。: You don't have enough material to register.

263361.どの場所に 立ってもらいますか？: Where would you like them to stand?

263362.<%sM_npctype>の\n<%sM_npcname>さんが やってきました:
<%sM_npcname> of <%sM_npctype> has arrived!
Others who are in My Town will have to
re-enter My Town to see the changes.

264940.性別が合わない装備品が 含まれているので\nこの衣装を着ることが できません。:
You cannot wear this outfit because it
contains equipment that does not match your
gender.

265194.<%sM_npcname>さんの 見た目を変えますか？\n<yesno>\n<c:
Would you like to change the look of
<%sM_npcname>?
<yesno>
<close>

265404.<%sM_npcname>さんの 設定を 変更しました！\nマイタウンの中にいる:
You have changed your <%sM_npcname>'s settings!
Others in My Town will have to re-enter My
Town for the settings to take effect.

265405.<%sM_npcname>さんと お別れしました。\nマイタウンの中にいる 他の:
We have parted ways with <%sM_npcname>.
Others who are in My Town will have to
re-enter My Town to see the changes.

265508.その場所には 配置できません。\n他の場所を 指定してください。:
Cannot be placed in that location. Please
select a different location.

265509.その名前では 登録できません。\n他の名前を 設定してください。:
The name cannot be registered. Please set
another name.

265510.登録に失敗しました。\n時間をおいて もう一度 お試しください。: Registration failed. Please try again later.

265511.お別れすることが できませんでした。\n時間をおいて もう一度 お試しください。:
We could not say goodbye. Please try again
later.

271738.<%sM_npcname>さんの 衣装を 変更しました！\nマイタウンの中にいる:
You have changed your <%sM_npcname>'s outfit!
Others in My Town will have to re-enter My
Town for the settings to take effect.

271990.衣装を変更することが できませんでした。\n時間をおいて もう一度 お試しくださ:
We were unable to change the outfit. Please
try again later.

275397.名前が 長すぎます。\n他の名前を 設定してください。: The name is too long. Please set another name.

291504.やくわりが 変更されたため\n肩書きと「なまえ」を合わせた文字数が\n<%nM_:
Due to a change in the job title, the total number of characters in the title and name has exceeded <%dM_namelength>. Please set "Name"
to be within <%dM_namelength> characters together with the title.
